test_cases.subject: CRITICAL: Production database offline - 500 users affected
test_cases.body: Our production database went down 10 minutes ago. All customer-facing applications are unavailable. We have 500+ active users unable to access the system. This is causing significant revenue loss. URGENT assistance needed!

test_cases.subject: Security Alert: Suspicious login attempts detected
test_cases.body: We've noticed unusual login attempts from multiple IP addresses in the past hour. Concerned about potential data breach. Need immediate security review and possible account lockdown.

test_cases.subject: Cannot reset password - getting error message
test_cases.body: Hi team, I'm trying to reset my password but keep getting an 'Invalid token' error. I've tried 3 times. Can you help? I need to access my account for a client meeting tomorrow.

test_cases.subject: Bug: Export function downloads blank CSV file
test_cases.body: When I try to export my project data to CSV, the file downloads but it's completely empty. This happens consistently. Using Chrome browser, version 120. Not urgent but annoying!

test_cases.subject: Feature Request: Dark mode for dashboard
test_cases.body: Would love to see a dark mode option for the dashboard. I work late nights and the bright interface strains my eyes. No rush, just a suggestion for future updates!

test_cases.subject: Thank you for excellent support!
test_cases.body: Just wanted to send a quick note to thank your team for resolving my integration issue yesterday. The support was fast and professional. Keep up the great work!

test_cases.subject: URGENT: Payment gateway failing - losing customers
test_cases.body: Our payment gateway has been failing for the past 30 minutes. Multiple customers reporting they can't complete purchases. This is a critical revenue-impacting issue. We need this fixed ASAP!

test_cases.subject: Question about API rate limits
test_cases.body: Hi, I'm building an integration and wanted to understand the API rate limits better. The documentation mentions 1000 requests/hour but I'm not clear if that's per user or per app. Thanks!

test_cases.subject: Dashboard loading very slowly since update
test_cases.body: After yesterday's system update, our dashboard takes 15-20 seconds to load instead of the usual 2-3 seconds. It's affecting team productivity but not completely blocking work.

test_cases.subject: DATA LOSS: All customer records disappeared!
test_cases.body: EMERGENCY! All our customer records vanished from the system 5 minutes ago. We had 2,000+ records and now showing zero. This is catastrophic for our business. HELP IMMEDIATELY!
